item.title: Benefits of Aloe vera in Oral Health
item.description: Aloe vera or aloe barbadensis, is a medicinal plant which is a thick short stemmed plant that stores aloe vera gel in its leaves. It is used topically in most of today's skin diseases,sun burns,hair etc. Studies have shown that aloe vera has its own benefits in oral health as well. Aloe vera contains more vitamins and minerals.
